title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
shortDescription: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness.
description: Doing well with money isn’t necessarily about what you know. It’s about how you behave. And behavior is hard to teach, even to really smart people.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
shortDescription: An easy & proven way to build good habits.
description: No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving every day. James Clear reveals practical strategies that will teach you exactly how to form good habits.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
shortDescription: What the rich teach their kids about money.
description: This book challenges the way many people think about money and investing, emphasizing financial independence and smart investing.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
shortDescription: A fable about following your dream.
description: Combining magic, mysticism, wisdom and wonder into an inspiring tale of self-discovery, The Alchemist has become a modern classic.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
shortDescription: Rules for focused success in a distracted world.
description: Deep work is the ability to focus without distraction on a cognitively demanding task. It's a skill that allows you to quickly master complicated information.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
shortDescription: Explore the two systems that drive the way we think.
description: Kahneman explains the two systems that drive the way we think. System 1 is fast, intuitive, and emotional; System 2 is slower, more deliberative, and more logical.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: From a renowned historian comes a groundbreaking narrative of humanity’s creation and evolution.

title: The 5 AM Club
author: Robin Sharma
shortDescription: Own your morning. Elevate your life.
description: Through an enchanting story, The 5 AM Club will walk you through the morning routine that has helped many maximize their productivity.

title: Zero to One
author: Peter Thiel
shortDescription: Notes on startups, or how to build the future.
description: The next Bill Gates will not build an operating system. If you are copying these guys, you aren't learning from them.

title: Show Your Work!
author: Austin Kleon
shortDescription: 10 ways to share your creativity and get discovered.
description: Austin Kleon reveals how to take that next step of getting discovered by sharing your work and process.

title: Start with Why
author: Simon Sinek
shortDescription: How great leaders inspire everyone to take action.
description: START WITH WHY shows that the leaders who've had the greatest influence in the world all think, act, and communicate the same way.

title: Ikigai
author: Hector Garcia
shortDescription: The Japanese secret to a long and happy life.
description: According to the Japanese, everyone has an ikigai—a reason for living. Finding it is the key to a long and happy life.
